Description: Model celt of dull blue stone, possibly amazonite rather than turquoise; pierced through top for suspension; used as an amuletic pendant (?); polished surface; complete.
Curator's comments: According to Petrie, this amulet is made of polished blue paste (Petrie 1886, 43). Petrie, W. M. F. 1886, Naukratis. Part I, 1884-5 (Third Memoir of the Egypt Exploration Fund), London.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (p. 43, pl. XX, no. 14)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (OK.411) (phase 3)
